nodes.title: On naming things
nodes.excerpt: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation, naming things, and off-by-one errors. Out of those two and a halfâ€¦
nodes.description: Naming is hard. Naming is subjective. Yet there are some things we can objectively do when it comes to finding proper names.

nodes.title: Avoiding legacy systems
nodes.excerpt:
No one likes working with legacy systems.
They are hard to maintain.
They are not fun to work with.
Every bug report you get, you feel likeâ€¦
nodes.description: Every software will eventually become a nightmare to maintain, unless we actively do something about it.
